Pages.Text: There are various ways to control your camera view, all located on the KEYPAD.  Some useful keys to know are: [Keypad Enter] gives you a map view useful when you're out in the open; [Keypad /] or [F2] lets you move the camera with the mouse; [Keypad 5] is top-down view; [Keypad .] is first-person view; and [Keypad 0] resets all other camera views.
